document.full_text: new worries about a new york nuclear plant's vulnerability to earthquakes could hand the state's governor an opportunity to try to close the plant, but new york city's huge power needs could stall any such moves.
document.title: new york nuclear plant's future shaky as fears grow
lines_and_colors: new worries about a new york nuclear plant's vulnerability to earthquakes could hand the state's governor an opportunity to try to close the plant, but new york city's huge power needs could stall any such moves.
